channel.title: ExurbiaX - My First Server! - V2 Is Out! - Dark Bow Minigame!
channel.description:
Okay first off credits; Whoever Created ParadiseX Marcman906 Garrett (not registered on forums)
Well this is my first source that I haven't been using for a long time but baseball season just started so I won't be able to code it as much. So maybe one of you guys can code it more often and/or better than I can. This is Delta. Please don't leech. (Stay tuned for the next version.)
Features: All skills working (except Slayer, you start out with 99 slayer) Thieving stalls only give 25k, 50k, then 100k for a established economy. Leveling up is not as fast as other servers so everyone is not a level 126. You can't buy any rares, you have to kill the NPC's that drop them.
Ok I just finished working on the new version and I don't know what to call it so I'm just calling it V2.
Here are the new features in V2: Moved the prayer altar to home Added a Dark Bow minigame command (::dbmini) Made the second NPC of the DB Mini aggresive (max hit is 20) Changed the last NPC of the DB Mini to "Shade." His/her/it max is 26. Added the DB Minigame tele to the Minigames 2 tab Added the tunnel entrance to Kalphite Queen to home Completely prevented rollbacks
Here's some pictures:
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/home-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/frontoftrainingarea.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/backoftrainingarea.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/duelarena.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/elfs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/jadentrance.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/funpk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/kbd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/paladins.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/pestcontrol.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/wildzones.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/shadowbeast.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/crystalbowdegrading.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/dagglair.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/assault.png[/img]
Dark Bow Minigame pictures:
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/firstmonster.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/secondmonster.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/thirdmonster.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff31/jessicahannah6855/endofgame.png[/img]
Like what you see? Here are the V2 download links:
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?my0mmizxgnu
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?t4m0lcmqcwi
Mirror: Uppit
Source: http://uppit.com/v/8QQKQZEH
Client: http://uppit.com/v/F0HRGGL9
THe client IP is already set to 127.0.0.1 for you testing pleasure.
Please post some feedback! I want to know what you guys think of my first server!

item.title: ExurbiaX - My First Server! - V2 Is Out! - Dark Bow Minigame!
item.dc:creator: @disrupt disrupt
item.description:
@disrupt wrote:

[quote=“marcman906, post:20, topic:329916”][quote author=disrupt link=topic=426302.msg3132551#msg3132551 date=1266626444]

nice but spirit beast or what ever u should have done corp anyways 10/10 btw what does the spirit beast thing drop?
nice i might use

EDIT: u have earned rep++

Thanks for the rep++:)

Yeah I’m probably going to change Shadow Beast into Corp Beast if I can find the ID. But the Shadow Beast drops Dragon Claws and Dragon Bones only. I used to make him drop Godswords but I figured thats why there’s a GWDs minigame

EDIT: I ended up changing the last NPC to “Shade.” Re-download the V2 and tell me how you like it.

k

EDIT: OMFG… ITS AMAZING U GOTTA MAKE A V3
[/quote]
Thanks man I really appreciate it. What suggestions do you have for V3? I was thinking of adding some more minigames and quest teles.[/quote]

yeah that would be wicked ill think of stuff for u and post em see if u like em

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @marcman906 marcman906
item.description:
@marcman906 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:9, topic:329916”]i see an issue…

the final boss to your ‘minigame’ is a black demon, and one of the monsters at the training place is a black demon…
thatll cause issues with your minigame wont it…?
(if you get teled to a place after killing the black demon etc)[/quote]
Thanks for catching that I thought I would just use the same NPC but didn’t realize that it would give you a DB. Any suggestions on which I should change it to? Thanks for the feedback.

Read full topic
